AI Description: PISCES (Practical Instructor for SCience Education Simulations) is a suite of interactive computer simulations for introductory college physics. It provides a platform for students to engage in virtual experiments and explore basic concepts in physics.
Core Features: Interactive Virtual Experiments, Engaging Simulations For Introductory Physics Concepts, Visualization Of Physics Principles, Educational Tool For College-Level Physics
General Tags: Physics, Simulation, Education, Science, Virtual Experiments
